website_summaries.verdict: Vibrant, bright, and wide, this gaming monitor’s slick 4K WQHD resolution will make your PC game library look its absolute best.
pros: Highly detailed and smooth 4K WQHD resolution
cons: This is a pricey gaming monitor, but you get what you pay for

customer_reviews.title: Great colours, fast response, high quality build
customer_reviews.text: The monitor feels high quality, the colour reproduction is excellent. The FreeSync option works great with nVidia GSync compatibility settings, gaming is smooth at 144Hz. HDR is great, be aware it auto enables extra sharpness which I'd turn off.. but HDR needs to be disabled anyway if you want to enable FreeSync so I only switch it on as needed, then go back to FreeSync when gaming. The 'bleed' another reviewer seems to talk about is merely IPS glow, which is expected with an IPS panel. It's not as bad as they show in the picture, in fact I don't notice it at as I play games.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Back light bleed
customer_reviews.text: Tried two of these monitors, the back light bleed is pretty bad. The colours are nice though, but the BLB is noticeable on medium dark screens. For the price you would expect less BLB.
customer_reviews.author: PokerMaster

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying this monitor. 120 Hz gaming is just lovely. Thanks to the Gsync-compatible Freesync there's no tearing or anything, and thanks to my fibre-optic video cable ( I can run it at a distance from my PC. There is some backlight bleed, but that on mine is nowhere near as bad as the other reviewer has experienced. I did turn the brightness right down - at 50% it was very glaring. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Stephens

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 ⭐ rather than a 4 ⭐
customer_reviews.text: It has the glow 💡, and 3rd time lucky getting one that was suitable. 1st had a scratch 2nd a green patch on the screen. Amazon sorted this out no problem 👍 It does rotate (see pic), swivel, tilt and height adjust. Bit of tweaking setting the screen, but looks really rather good. Tried to uploaded a video of it playing a YouTube hdr video, error processing. So on YouTube if you search for XV272UP playing HDR Channel Dubai video you should see what it looks like. It was a present so can't comment gaming wise, but gets a thumbs up 👍 in that department from the user.
customer_reviews.author: JACK

customer_reviews.title: Acer monitors are always faulty.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor and used it for a day. Dead Pixels and lots of white marks as if the screen was badly pressed when fitting. I don't think Acer people who mount the screens have good hands. Will not recommend. The colors and speed is good as expected from IPS.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality and performance for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable for only £350 144hz 1440p is a bargain. Especially since its compatible with nvidia's G-Sync. Stand is very durable and the additional USB ports are handing. Overall build quality is good and 0 back light bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Kacper

customer_reviews.title: Ruined by Brutal Back-light Bleed
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, but of course the one I received has ridiculous back-light bleed. I'm going to try for a replacement and pray that the next one is better.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Totally perfect. I got this to super cheap renowned desktop. I'm super delighted with my dauther new gaming setup. This monitor has much more options you would think of. Will last years.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia

customer_reviews.title: Data Cable Connection NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Having real issues getting the Data Cable Display ports to work with this monitor I get continuous no signal and input not supported error messages when trying to boot into Windows HDMI works fine 4k at 60hz but I did nt pay for 4k 60hz I paid for 4k 122hz and gsync etc etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixel
customer_reviews.text: Dead pixel in the middle of screen the day after the amazon returns windows, Acer does not have usable a returns policy

customer_reviews.title: Love's it
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my son and he's very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Miss brooke

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It died on me after 2-3 weeks, first started flicking on and off, then eventually would not turn on
customer_reviews.author: Donal Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I had this monitor running for an hour watching some videos and I can say the picture quality is very good. I decided to start playing some battlefield v just after and all of a sudden the monitor sort of flickers and all these lines are now going down the screen and I cant get rid of them done updates on pc and made sure graphics card drivers were up to date still with no change then decided to change display port cable with another and still has lines going down the screen. Stay away from this one not good.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good vibrant colors, nice deep blacks and a good refresh rate. Only complaint I have is the speakers are truly awful, could have saved a few bob by not including them at all.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: The best budget monitor for 2019
customer_reviews.text: Top monitor with competitive refresh rate no issues so far, bought on Acer Store. Compatible with G Sync or HDR 400.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith
